ul.li: Search for all students: Leave all editable fields blank.
Search for student with specific student identification: Enter student ID into student ID field.
Search for all students with the same birthday: Enter the birth date using strict format of MM//DD/YYYY (i.e. 01/01/2001)
Search for all students with similar phone number: Enter wild card phone number ( i.e. %223%) in the phone field.
Search for all student with last name "Nguyễn": Enter "Nguy%" into Last Name field. Due to an unresolved Unicode bug, you cannot enter the full last name "Nguyễn"
Search for all students start with "Tr" like Trương and Trần: Enter "Tr%" into Last Name field.
Search for all students in Giáo Lý 3A: Enter "3" and "A" in the first and second field of Giáo Lý group respesctively. This is multiple fields criteria.
Search all students in Giáo Lý 3 include all subclasses: Enter "3" in the first field of Giáo Lý field groups.
Search all students who attend both Giaoly 5 and Vietngu 4: Enter "5" in the first field of Giaoly group and "4" in the first field of Vietngu group. This is multiple fields search criteria.
Last Name, Middle Name, First Name, and Phone fields accept wide card character ́(%). For example: Nguy%, %223%.
Student ID is the prefer search criteria. Otherwise use birth date, combination of last name and first name, or phone to lookup the student..
